mention.text: the idea behind a new form of fund-raising that has helped one local nonprofit group raise hundreds of thousands of dollars
the president of the nonprofit group , known as Mouse , for Making Opportunities for Upgrading Schools and Education
20,000 shares of one company 's directed stock at a special price , and was given 5,000 shares by another company before its initial public offering
one company 's directed stock at a special price , and was given 5,000 shares by another company before its initial public offering
its initial public offering , one company
startup companies , which usually need about three years to establish themselves enough to make charitable donations
an opportunity to buy stock at bargain prices
10,000 directed shares that it received from Star Media Network , an Internet portal company , on which it has made a profit , on paper , of more than $ 300,000
a dilemma for startup companies , which usually need about three years to establish themselves enough to make charitable donations
young people who make a ton of money thinking outside the box , '' he said , '' when you ask them to give money
The assignment of restricted shares to charities
the foundation , which gives grants to improve education , housing and neighborhoods in the area
a wise way to tap into the windfalls that are common in a bullish economy through public offerings , stock options and bonuses
a great time to stop and think about giving money to a charity
the venture capitalists who invested in his firm
